template.name: RainbowCake ListAdapter
template.description: Creates the required classes for a basic ListAdapter implementation

parameter.name: Model name
parameter.help: The name of the model element in the list, for example User, Category, or Record

parameter.name: Include click listener
parameter.help: Adds a click listener to the itemView plus defines an interface for it.

parameter.name: Use AndroidX
parameter.help: Use AndroidX imports instead of the support library imports.

parameter.name: Presenter
parameter.help: The name of the presenter that the model class is nested in. If provided, the model will be imported automatically.
